articles.title: Nathan Eovaldi exemplifies the small-market thinking ruining Red Sox - NBC Sports Boston
articles.description: The Red Sox lost Nathan Eovaldi to the Rangers last offseason in the interest of cutting costs, and now they’re paying the price, writes John Tomase.
articles.content:
Nathan Eovaldi is what happens when a big-market team thinks small.
